description: Park kinetic model for air chemistry (neutral species only). From NASA TP-2867 Table III. All M reactions expanded into explicit individual reactions.
reference: Gnoffo, P.A., Gupta, R.N., and Shinn, J.L., 'Conservation Equations and Physical Models for Hypersonic Air Flows in Thermal and Chemical Nonequilibrium', NASA TP-2867, 1989.

units.C_f: cgs (cm^3/mol/s for bimolecular, cm^6/mol^2/s for termolecular)

reactions.description: N2 dissociation with M = N2 (from Table III reaction 5)
